text: Designing Women was an American television sitcom. It starred Dixie Carter, Annie Potts, Jean Smart and Delta Burke. It was broadcast from September 1986 to May 1993 on CBS. This series was about the working and personal lives of four southern women. == Nielsen ratings == Season Ratings Rank Households 1986–1987 No. 31 14,071,400 1987–1988 No. 33 13,874,760 1988–1989 No. 33 13,541,920 1989–1990 # 23TV Ratings > 1980's .
